forum.content:
feeling used but I’m still missing you
and I can’t see the end of this
just wanna feel your kiss against my lips
and now all this time is passing
but I still can’t seem to tell you why
it hurts me every time I see you
realize how much I need you
I hate you I love you I hate that I love you Don’t want to but I can’t put nobody else above you I hate that I want you you want her, you need her and I’ll never be her
i miss you when I can’t (sleep) or right when I can’t eat I miss you in my front seat
from nights we don’t remember Do you miss me like I miss you?
and I’m always tired but never of you
if I pulled a you on you, you wouldn’t like that shit
I put this reel out, but you wouldn’t bite that shit I got these feelings but you never mind that shit,ok, keep it on the low
if you wanted me you would just say so
and if I were you, I would never let me go
you ever wonder what we coulda been?
you said you wouldn’t and you fucking did
lie to me, lie with me, get your fucking fix
always missing people that I shouldn’t be missing
sometimes you gotta burn some bridges just to create some distance
I know that I control my thoughts, and I should stop reminiscing
when love and trust are gone I guess this is moving on everyone I do right does me wrong
all alone I watch you watch her like she’s the only girl you’ve ever seen you don’t care u never did uou don’t give a damn about me
forum.title: I hate that...
